message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $6,000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $12,000 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  While $12,000 is closer, it's still a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $8,000?  That's the very top of what I can afford.

I understand you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8,000 and $12,000, so I'll offer it to you for $10,000. This is my final offer in this range, so I hope you can meet me here.
